title: How Bad Can He Be? Only The 'Worst. Person. Ever.'
teaser: Author Douglas Coupland tells NPR's Arun Rath that he's not exactly sure how the lead character of his new novel entered his mind. (This story originally aired on Morning Edition on April 19, 2014.)
